channel.title: Home Theater?
channel.description: I have $200 dollars to spend on a surround sound system. I only need the speakers and maybe a sub woofer. I do not need a dvd player or bluray. Any suggestions?

item.title: Home Theater?
item.dc:creator: MtzBraves
item.description:
sersoft:

logitech z5500

I had seen those but wasn’t sure if I wanted to dish out $400

The sound doesnt have to sound “surround” I just need speakers that I can mount around a room, and preferably a sub too.

Read full topic

item.title: Home Theater?
item.dc:creator: MtzBraves
item.description:
sersoft:

2 hundred dollars? HOME THEATER!

seriously, you best be trollin’ nigga

everything that has to do with the words “home theater” is so hopelessly overpriced I don’t even wanna describe it

Oops I meant surround sound system. Yeah they are over priced but :fffuuu:

I can spend up to $250, but since I don’t have a job…lol.

EDIT: This is for music only. I won’t be watching movies with it at all. I just want good sound that I can set up around my room (my room is quite large, and consists of two rooms that are joined together. If you want pics, ask)
Thanks!

Read full topic
